translated: The Jātaka🔽The Collection of Long Discourses🔽The Chapter on Kusa Grass
The Jātaka of the Cat’s-Foot Plant
“One who, having made the Dhamma his banner,
That is called the cat’s-foot plant.”
The Jātaka of the Cat’s-Foot Plant is the eighth.
